Newsletter.doubleOptIn: Double-Opt-In: You will receive an email in which you are asked to confirm your registration.
Newsletter.optOut: Unsubscribe (Opt-Out): You can unsubscribe from this newsletter at any time. You will find an unsubscribe link in every newsletter.
Newsletter.optionalNameDeclaration: Entering your first name and surname is optional.
Newsletter.privacyInformationInfo: Further information about the newsletter and your options for revocation can be found in the privacy policy.
Newsletter.confirmationEmail: Thank you for your interest! You will receive a confirmation e-mail immediately. Please click on the link in this e-mail to activate your registration.
Newsletter.errorJoiningNewsletter: Error joining the newsletter. Please try again, or contact me directly at simeon.ohlsen@test.at
